page.title: 20Sports day at Weston School
page.content: Every year in july we have a school sports day .People in each class try to win each race held for their age group.There are houses and eash person that wins gets a points for their "Houses".Iam in" Weston house " and if i win a race weston would get added on to their "house "point cart. At the end of all the race there is a shield forthe"house"which has the most points.last year "crewe house won last year and thay kept the shield for year. Mrs Barratt our school meals assistants gives us a drink if we are thristy. I you came fist second or third in a race you go to the three judges and you come first you will get a blu badge
